sentences: The band is best known for the songs "I'm Not Over" and "Show Me What I'm Looking For" from their 2008 major-label debut album, Coming to Terms, produced by Swedish producers Max Martin and Tobias Karlsson.
The band was the supporting act on the David Cook/Gavin Degraw 2011 Fall Tour.
In 2012, they were the opening act for the Kelly Clarkson/The Fray Tour.
They also played as the opening act for Rob Thomas on his Thomas Cradlesong Tour in 2009â€“2010.
In 2014 Rickard gained prominence with the release of the hit "Bang Bang" (Ariana Grande, Jessie J, and Nicki Minaj)), which he co-wrote and co-produced.

During 2015-2017 he produced and wrote the leadoff track on Flo Rida's EP My House (EP)), co-wrote Ellie Goulding's track Still Falling for You from the soundtrack to the film Bridget Jones's Baby, co-wrote "Bills" by LunchMoney Lewis, and co-wrote and co-produced "Nobody Love," Tori Kelly's first entry on the US Billboard Hot 100.
In 2018 he co-wrote and co-produced "Empty Cups" from Charlie Puth's Voicenotes album.
His biggest hit of this period was his co-write of Ariana Grande's double-platinum "God Is a Woman" in 2018.
Further major success came in 2020 with his co-write and co-production of "Husavik" for the 2020 film Eurovision Song Contest: The Story of Fire Saga.
